content.prompt: Which of the following describes the qualities of the two secondary leading-tone seventh chords?

choices.label: The first is fully diminished, and the second is half diminished.
The first is half diminished, and the second is fully diminished.

unit.text: 7: Harmony and Voice Leading IV - Secondary Function

topic.text: 7.3: Tonicization through Secondary Leading Tone Chords

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
